TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hbun-lesa, title = Hbun-lesa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hbun-lesa} }

S.FORM: Hbun-lesa Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Hbun-lesa a niyaro', 19 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 61 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 50 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 2%, roma 5%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Hbon-lesa Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Hbon-lesa a niyaro', 19 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 61 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 50 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 75%, Amis 2%, roma 5%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
